titles.title: A resolution providing for agreeing to the Senate amendment to the bill (H. R. 1154) to remedy injury to the United States textile and apparel industries caused by increased imports.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-949.
Rules Committee Resolution H.Res.540 Reported to House.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 248 - 150 (Record Vote No: 341).

bill.summary: 9/22/1988--Introduced. Provides for taking from the Speaker's table H.R. 1154 (textile imports), with the Senate amendment thereto, and concurring in the Senate amendment.
